rows.label: qev086104_MSG0001
rows.name:
Meh?! Friend is giving away food?!
...Oh. Friend is collecting recipes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, Pirapira once dreamed up special recipe when
tummy was rumbly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0003
rows.name:
It originally thought up for Nopon traveling long road
in search of customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0004
rows.name:
It use local ingredients gathered at source and need
no special implements. Oh, and it CRAZY nutritious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Pirapira to just give you the recipe already.

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0005
rows.name:
This may not be easy for a human to hear.
Friend is sure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0006
rows.name:
First, catch whatever bugs are around.
Anything will do. Poison is just different spice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0007
rows.name:
Next, pick any nearby grass and weeds.
And remember thorns and stingy bits add texture![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0008
rows.name:
Take all that and grind into paste atop big flat rock,
then slow-roast in hot sun until very stinky.
After few hours or days, friend can enjoy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0009
rows.name: Dish provide important protein and dietary fiber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Hmm? Friend look pale.
Is tummy of friend rumbly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0011
rows.name: Ha! Friend should try recipe of Pirapira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086104_MSG0013
rows.name:
This very efficient recipe, so long as friend not care
about looks or presentation.[ST:wait ]
